main event: A circular blue-green object was observed trailing a stream of white-red color over Guam on 20 May 1959.
interesting points: The object trailed a stream of white-red color and persisted for 10-15 minutes after its passage,The object was the size of a half dollar and no sound was heard during the observation,The object was visible for an estimated 5 seconds while it passed in front of the observing aircraft,The sighting was reported by military personnel from Anderson AFB, Guam,The sighting was classified with insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: Captain, Pilot at Anderson AFB, Guam
